questions.description: Some of the emotions or feelings we experience are stressful. They might prevent us from focusing or completing the things we need to.
questions.title: In life, we experience many strong emotions.

questions.question: Which of these feelings sometimes get in the way of your focus?

imageMetadata.resources: Image by Shiv Mirthyu from Pixabay

questions.resources: Image by Shiv Mirthyu from Pixabay

imageMetadata.resources: Image by Gino Crescoli from Pixabay

questions.resources: Image by Gino Crescoli from Pixabay
questions.description: But there are strategies we can use to help us manage our strong emotions and calm ourselves. These strategies can help us feel better and re-focus. Let's try some!
questions.title: Everyone has a lot of different emotions.

questions.question: Do you already have strategies or tools you use to calm yourself?

choices.answer: I would not like to answer

questions.description: Put one hand up. As you breathe in, put your fingers up for 5 seconds. As you breathe out, put your fingers down slowly. You can repeat this 3 times.
questions.title: One strategy we can use is the Take-5 Breath.
A second strategy we can use is Belly Breaths.
questions.description: Put one hand on your belly. As you breathe in, notice how your hand moves out with your belly. Pause at the top and then breathe out slowly. You can repeat this 3 times.

questions.title: A third strategy we can use is Count to 10.
questions.description: You can count to 10 in your head or out loud. Then, if you want, you can count backwards to 0. You can repeat this 3 times.

choices.answer: Reflected on strategies we already knew

questions.question: Put the strategies in order of the ones we learned.

choices.answer: I feel calmer or more relaxed

questions.question: How you feel after trying these strategies?

questions.title: Remember...

imageMetadata.resources: Photo by Levi XU on Unsplash

questions.resources: Photo by Levi XU on Unsplash
questions.description: You can use these strategies and tools whenever you feel you need them. They can help you calm your body and your mind.
